DOC.brief_title: Prevention Ischemic Conditions Non-disabling Stroke/Transient Ischemic Attack With Remote Ischemic Conditioning
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , open-labeled phase II futility study . Application Remote ischemic conditioning ( RIC ) adjunctive therapy medication involve study . RIC consist five cycle 5-min inflation ( 200 mmHg ) 5-min deflation cuff bilateral upper limb twice day . The study test whether RIC effective prevent ischemic even minor ischemic stroke/transient ischemic attack within 3 month explore safety compliance chronic RIC . Medication strategy base physician 's best judgement .
